alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 7:30PM MST until August 31 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 729 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chui-Chu, or 10 miles south of Casa Grande, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Arizona City, La Palma, Blackwater, Toltec, Coolidge Airport, Arizola, Randolph, Valley Farms, Stanfield, and East Chui-Chu. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 145 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 147. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 129 and 136. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 167. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between 181 and 204. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
